name: The Regis Drinks Cabinet
description:
A vision of jet-black sophistication, the Regis Drinks Cabinet offers a forward-thinking interpretation of what luxury looks like in the 21st century. Defined by high gloss quilted maple in black graphite. Alongside unique marquetry in sycamore pearl. The Cabinet is the ideal addition to an interior unrivalled in elegance.
The dark sophistication of the graphite black maple alongside the shimmering grey sycamore creates a sleek and modern magic. Inside, adjustable glass shelves and internal faces in sycamore pearl create a cool pale grey space. Ideal for stashing entertaining essentials such as glasses, bottles, and crockery.
The Regis Cabinet features marquetry that combines smooth curves and sharp lines. Offering the enduring elegance that befits a regal residence. The marquetry detail further exemplifies DAVIDSON's faultless craftsmanship and ability to reimagine classic design, offering the iconic style necessary for a grand home interior.
